effect.short: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with paralysis.
